dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: We'll rescue the survivor like you requested, so... can you stop pointing that finger at me...?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: ... I-it's morning already?! I gotta run if I wanna suit up and make it to the morning assembly—

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: There's a lot of paperwork to be done. Hopefully we can take care of this process before the sun goes down... Let's hurry.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Can't be too careful when taking on late night rescue contracts. It often ends up putting us in danger, too.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
The Zwei Knights wear these gaudy armors not only because it's our uniform... but also because it draws attention away from our clients when the battle gets messy.
And here I was, thinking that this cape was bothersome... I guess everything has a reason.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
There's something I realized whenever I go on joint operations with other Association Fixers... It's that most people don't care about protecting or saving someone.
I know that we only move when we're paid to do so, but... our Association's the best when it comes to protecting their clients.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Sometimes, we receive contracts that are clearly above our pay grade. I hate taking those contracts, but...
If they pay enough, us Zwei Fixers have no choice but to do as our Association tells us to do.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
I hate myself for growing so accustomed to people dying around me. I know, I don't have a choice. But...
... No. I can't be so weak-willed... I can't protect anything like this. Just like that day...

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
I don't think there's anything wrong with wishing safety for everyone.
It's just that it's... impossible. It's the City. We can't even protect the people we love.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: ... Huh? O-oh! Please don't go wandering off on your own!

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Don't worry. You're my target... so I'll protect you no matter what.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Quest... confirmed.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Thus becomes your blade and shield, this greatsword...

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I thought I submitted everything...? What's wrong?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Securing personnel...!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Get behind me, now...!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Nngh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Excluding high-risk individuals...

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I'll be fine... so run... get as far away as you can from here...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I can protect one more person, yeah... But only this time, okay? I can't do this again.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... I'm sorry. This was not a part of my contract.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: We suffered some losses, but... I guess it couldn't be helped. There's only so much a shield can protect.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: We actually rescued everyone. I guess days of hard work does pay off... sometimes.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: We... failed the contract. I couldn't protect anyone... They're... all dead...
